discoverSec.title: Luxury in Every Vein
discoverSec.description: Discover our premium selection of natural marble, crafted by nature and perfected for timeless beauty. Each piece tells a unique story, adding elegance and prestige to your space.

servicesSection.title: El Behery Marble Company
servicesSection.description1: El Behery Marble is a leading name in luxury marble craftsmanship. For years, we have been providing high-quality marble solutions for homes, offices, and commercial spaces. Our expertise ranges from elegant flooring to bespoke countertops, delivering timeless beauty and unmatched durability.
servicesSection.description2: With a commitment to excellence, we source the finest materials and employ skilled artisans to bring your vision to life. At El Behery, every project is a masterpiece.

inspir.title: Why Choose Us?
inspir.description: Discover the key reasons why our marble stands out in luxury, quality, and elegance.

luxury.title: Premium Natural Marble
luxury.desc: We select the finest types of natural marble to ensure unmatched beauty and durability.

design.title: Unique Designs
design.desc: We offer distinctive patterns and cuts that add a touch of luxury and uniqueness to every project.

craft.title: High Craftsmanship
craft.desc: Our skilled team guarantees precision in execution and flawless finishes.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.desc: We are committed to delivering long-lasting works with exceptional quality.

weOffer.title: What We Offer
weOffer.description: A showcase of our stunning marble work, crafted to perfection.

marble.name: Marble
marble.description: Luxury natural stone for timeless elegance.

granite.name: Granite
granite.description: Durable and stylish surfaces for modern spaces.

collect.title: Our Collections
collect.desc: Discover a handpicked selection of our finest works, crafted with precision and timeless elegance.

about.title: About
about.desc1: We are a leading company in the field of marble and granite, providing elegant and durable solutions for homes and businesses.
about.desc2: With years of expertise, we take pride in delivering timeless designs that combine natural beauty with exceptional craftsmanship.

history.title: Our History
history.desc: A journey of excellence and craftsmanship that has grown stronger with every passing year.

2005.text: El Behery Marble was founded, laying the cornerstone of luxury stone craftsmanship.

2012.text: Expanded operations with advanced machinery and a wider range of marble and granite collections.

2023.text: Became a leading name in the marble industry, delivering premium quality worldwide.

fourth.title: What Our Clients Say
fourth.desc: Our reputation is built on trust and excellence. Here’s what our clients have to say about working with us.

testimonials.name: Hosam El Behery
testimonials.feedback: El Behery Marble transformed my living room with elegance and timeless beauty. Truly a masterpiece!

testimonials.name: Adham El Sayed
testimonials.feedback: Working with El Behery was a smooth experience. Their quality and attention to detail are unmatched.

testimonials.name: Omar Hossam
testimonials.feedback: Reliable, premium quality, and always on time. They are my go-to for all marble projects.

about-last.title: Transform Your Space with Elegance
about-last.desc: We bring timeless marble designs crafted with precision and unmatched craftsmanship. Your vision, our expertise.

contactHero.title: Get in Touch with El Behery Marble
contactHero.description: From timeless marble designs to bespoke solutions, our team is ready to bring elegance and durability to your projects. Let’s start the conversation today.

contactSplit.title: Let's build something
contactSplit.desc: Our dedicated team is always ready to discuss your project, whether you're envisioning luxury marble flooring, a custom kitchen countertop, or a full commercial solution.
